case.title: 1MDB-Tanore Trial (RM2.28 Billion)
case.subtitle: Najib Razak's Largest 1MDB Criminal Case
case.description: The 1MDB-Tanore trial is the largest of Najib Razak's corruption cases, involving RM2.28 billion allegedly misappropriated from 1Malaysia Development Berhad. Najib faces 4 charges: 1 count of abuse of power for using his position to receive RM2.28 billion in bribes related to 1MDB, and 3 counts of money laundering involving the same amount. The funds allegedly flowed through Tanore Finance Corporation and Good Star Limited. This trial is separate from the SRC International case and represents the bulk of the 1MDB scandal allegations against Najib.
case.metaDescription: Follow Najib Razak's 1MDB-Tanore trial involving RM2.28 billion. Complete timeline, legal teams, and ongoing proceedings of Malaysia's largest corruption case.

timeline.title: Charged with 4 Counts
timeline.description: Najib Razak was charged with 4 counts: 1 count of abuse of power under Section 23 of the MACC Act 2009 and 3 counts of money laundering under AMLA 2001, involving RM2.28 billion from 1MDB funds. He pleaded not guilty.

timeline.title: Trial Commences
timeline.description: The trial began at the Kuala Lumpur High Court before Justice Collin Lawrence Sequerah. The prosecution outlined how funds allegedly flowed from 1MDB through various entities.

timeline.title: AmBank Witnesses Testify
timeline.description: Former AmBank officers testified about the flow of funds into Najib's personal accounts, including transfers from Tanore Finance Corporation.

timeline.title: Former 1MDB CEO Testifies
timeline.description: Former 1MDB CEO Mohd Hazem Abd Rahman testified about board decisions and the role of Jho Low in 1MDB operations.

timeline.title: Prosecution Rests Case
timeline.description: After calling numerous witnesses including former 1MDB officials and banking officers, the prosecution closed its case.

timeline.title: Prima Facie Case Established
timeline.description: Justice Sequerah ruled that the prosecution had established a prima facie case on all 4 charges. Najib was called to enter his defense.

timeline.title: Defense Case Begins
timeline.description: Najib's defense case commenced. The defense argued that Najib was misled by fugitive businessman Jho Low and other advisors.

timeline.title: Najib Concludes Testimony
timeline.description: Najib completed his testimony after lengthy cross-examination. He maintained that he believed the funds were donations and investments.

timeline.title: Trial Continues with Defense Witnesses
timeline.description: The trial continues with defense witnesses being called. The defense team is presenting evidence on the role of third parties in the alleged misappropriation.
